headline: HPE Named a Leader in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Enterprise Storage Platforms
summary: HOUSTON, September 05, 2025--HPE (NYSE: HPE) today announced it was named a Leader for the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Enterprise Storage Platforms. This marks the 16th consecutive year of recognition as a Leader for HPE’s Ability to Execute and Completeness of Vision.
